channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-6357|2023-12-05T14:29:25.649Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: A low-privileged remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability and inject additional system commands via file system libraries which could give the attacker full control of the device.
